759:952: anyatra gatau saṃmukhībhāvato hyete sapta kuśalāḥ karmapathā vidyante|
759:987: yattena parasya duḥkhā vedanā janitā tatonarakeṣūpapadyate|
759:989: yattejo nāśitaṃ tena bāhyā bhāvāḥ kṛśaujasaḥ|
759:997: pañca phalānyuktāni teṣāṃ kataratkarma katibhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalam ?
759:1000: prahāṇamārge samale pañcabhiḥ phalaiḥ karma saphalaṃ bhavati|
759:1001: tulyā adhikā api tasya paścādutpannāḥ sadaśā dharmā ṇi(ni)
759:1009: yacca tatprahāṇaṃ tadbalena hi tatprāptyu pattiḥ|
759:1010: adhipatiphalaṃ svabhāvādanye sarvasaṃskārāḥ pūrvotpanna varjjā iti draṣṭavyam|
759:1013: yattu nirmalaprahāṇamārge karma taccaturbhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalaṃ vipākaphalaṃ muktvā|
759:1016: yacca prahāṇamārgādanyatkuśalasāsravaṃ[karmaṃ] yaccākuśalaṃ tadapi caturbhireva phalaiḥ saphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ tyaktvā||
759:1021: phalaṃ śubhasya catvāri dve trīṇi ca śubhādayaḥ||
759:1022: kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmāścatvāri phalāni vipākaphalaṃ hitvā|
759:1025: [208] śubhādyāstvaśubhasya dve trīṇi catvāri ca kramāt|
759:1026: akuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale|
759:1036: avyākṛtasya te tu dve trīṇi trīṇi śubhādayaḥ||
759:1037: avyākṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale|
759:1045: vartamānāstu dharmā vartamānasya karmaṇaḥ dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale|
759:1046: ajātasya tvajātā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni niṣyandavisaṃyogaphale hitvā||
759:1048: svabhūmikā dharmāḥ karmaṇo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ catvāri phalāni visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā|
759:1061: [211] ekaṃ trīṇi dvayaṃ caiva śaikṣādyāḥ paścimasya tu|
759:1063: aśaikṣasya khalu karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmā ekamadhipatiphalam,
759:1067: naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣāṇāṃ punaḥ śaikṣā dharmā dve puruṣākārādhipatiphale|
759:1071: [212] trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛṣṭiheyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ|
759:1078: te tvabhyāsapraheyasya dve catvāri tridhā matāḥ||
759:1096: tadyathā citrakara ekayā vartyā katsnaṃ rūpamākṣipati,
759:1098: atha yaduktaṃ bhagavatā-“karmasvako'yaṃ bhikṣavo lokaḥ” iti|
759:1103: yatkhalu kāyavāṅmanaskarma svayaṃ kṛtaṃ kuśalākuśalamabhyatītaṃ dadatphalaṃ sā karmasvakatā draṣṭavyā||
759:1104: kathaṃ punaḥ pratikṣaṇabhidureṣu saṃskāreṣu parasparākṛtasaṅketeṣu satsu,
759:1105: asati ca nitye karttari bhoktari ca karmasvakatā'bhidhīyate ?
759:1108: karttṛtā bhoktṛtā coktā niṣiddhā śāśvatasya tu||
759:1112: śāśvate tvātmani niṣkriye pūrvapaścādviśeṣābhāvāt karttṛtvaṃ cātyantāpadhvastayuktividhānam|
759:1113: skandhasantāne tu viśiṣṭaskandhāntarotpattau satyāṃ bījajalābhiṣekādyanugrahā[d] viśiṣṭaphalotpattivaditi|
759:1117: syātkhalu karmasvakatā nāpi ca tasya karmaṇo vipāke'vasthita iti catuṣkoṭikā|
759:1120: yadi tasya karmaṇaḥ phale'vasthitastacca karma vihīnaṃ bhavati||
759:1131: syātkhalu karmaṇā samanvāgato na ca tasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ vedayate|
759:1138: yogavihitamayogavihitaṃ ca karmoktaṃ tasya kiṃ lakṣaṇam ?
759:1142: yatkiñcitkhalu kliṣṭaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma kleśopakleśadūṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tadayogavihitama,
759:1144: anye punarbruvate-yatkhalu śikṣāvyapetaṃ yathā gantavyaṃ sthātavyamityevamādi,
759:1145: yattu liṅgavacanahīnamasaṃbaddhaṃ nirarthakaṃ ca vākkarma tadayogavihitam|
759:1148: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau caturthasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ||
759:1152: timirotsādanakarīṃ karmasvakatāṃ kaḥ svayamabhisaṃbuddhya lokānugrahāya pradarśayatīti ? brūmaḥ|
759:1154: sa punaḥ kiṃ cittotpādātprabhṛti bodhisattvo bhavati ?
759:1160: yataḥ prabhṛti kalyāṇamitraṃ bhagavantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha[māpa]dya tadupadarśitadakṣiṇamārgaḥ yoniśo manasikārādhiṣṭhitabuddhiḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokamatrāṇamaśaraṇamaparāyaṇaṃ pañcagatimahāvarte jātijarāvyādhimaraṇādiduḥkhakṣārāmbhasi,
759:1167: pratighabhujaṅgadaṃṣṭrā viṣadūṣito'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā maitryāgadena praśamitavyaḥ|
759:1168: tṛṣṇāpiśācīlalitābhibhūtamatirayaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā śamathabalena tṛṣṇānirodhasukhaṃ lambhayitavyaḥ|
759:1169: parāmarśabhūtagrahāviṣṭo'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā vimokṣasukhasvastyayanena nirbhayamamṛtapadaṃ praveśayitavyaḥ|
759:1170: mānagiriśikharādhirūḍhabuddhirayaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā karmasvakatājñānavajreṇa mānagirīnvicūrṇya praśāntamānamadāmarśaśāntipade sthāpayitavyaḥ|
759:1171: vicikitsākathaṃkathībhāvaśalyaviddhahṛdayo'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā pratītyasamutpādapravicayaśalākayā kāṅkṣāśalyamutpāṭyāmṛtarasaṃ pāyayitavyaḥ|
759:1172: jarāvyādhimaraṇamakaradaṃṣṭrāntargato'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā sarvānarthaviyuktaṃ nirvṛtisukhaṃ prāpayitavyaḥ|
759:1173: śraddhādiguṇadhanadaridro'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā bodhyaṅgaratnakhacite mahati guṇaiśvaryapade sanniveśayitavyaḥ|
759:1182: yadā khalvayaṃ puruṣatvajātismaratvādiṣu padasthāneṣu niyatībhato bhavati-
759:1184: ato jñānaprasthāne'smādavagheḥ prabhṛti bodhisattvaḥ anenābhiprāyeṇa paṭhitaḥ|
759:1188: dviṣatāmapi yaṃ dṛṣṭvā manaḥ sadyaḥ prasīdati||
759:1196: yatpunarjanmaśarīraṃ bhagavatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodherāśrayabhūtaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ khacitamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitam,
759:1197: yatkhalu dṛṣṭvā svavikalpasamutthitapratighadūṣitabuddhī nāmapi mārapakṣyāṇāṃ tīrthyāṇāṃ ca manaḥ prasīdati|
759:1332: atha tadādyaṃ bodhicittaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dāḍharyeṇa kathamiva draṣṭavyam ?
759:1346: buddhotpāde naraḥ strī vā tadādyaṃ cittamaśnute||
759:1352: manuṣyo vā strī votpādayati nānya iti|
759:1359: prathame khalvasaṃkhyeye vartamāno bodhisattvaḥ na sarvasmai nāpi sarvaṃ na sarvadā dadāti|
759:1361: tṛtīye sarvai sarvasmai sarvadā ca prayacchati|
759:1364: yadā punaḥ prāṇaparityāgenāpi prāṇātipātādiśikṣāpadaṃ na kṣobhayati,
759:1368: bhagavantaṃ khalu tiṣyaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ ekayā gāthayā ekapādena sthitvā saptāhamabhiṣṭhuvataḥ śākyamunervīyapāramitā paripūrṇā nava ca kalpāḥ pratyudāvartitāḥ|
759:1375: hiṣkṛtabuddhayaḥ prāhuḥ- “na hi piṭakatraye bhagavatā bodhisattvamārga upadiṣṭaḥ|
759:1388: dṛśyate, dharmatāṃ ca vilomayati nedaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanam” iti kṛṣṇāpadeśaḥ|
759:1390: yatkhalu sūtraṃ bhagavatā buddhena bhāṣitaṃ taccaturṣvāgameṣu sthaviramahākāśyapasthavirāṇa(na)
759:1397: yadi saṃkhyā na vidyate kathaṃ tarhi trayamiti nirdhāryate ?
759:1398: na khalu saṃkhyā na vidyate| kiṃ tarhi ?
759:1402: na tu na saṃkhyā vidyata ityetadvivakṣitam|
759:1403: atha yaṃ śākyamunirbhagavānsamyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvacaryāyāmeṣu triṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu kiyato(tāṃ)
759:1409: kasya punaḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyāvasāne katamo buddho babhūva ?
759:1414: kasminpunaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhe buddhatve prathamaṃ cittamutpāditam ? śākyamunī|
759:1415: śākyamunirnāma prathamasyāsaṃkhyeyasyādau babhūva yatra bhagavatā bhārgavabhūtena sukhodakenāṅgaparicaryābhirupasthānaṃ kṛtvā prathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditamahamapyevaṃ prakāro bhūyāsamiti|
759:1417: kasminpunaḥ kāle buddhā bhagavanto buddhādityāḥ prādurbhavanti ?
759:1444: yāvatkhalu kaścidguṇaḥ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya bhagavatā deśito vinirmukta(kti)
759:1450: tadyathā dvayormātrostulyaṃ vastu tulye kṣetre pratipādayatoścetanāviśeṣādatulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati,
759:1451: tadvaduttamārthaṃ prārthayamānānāṃ trayāṇāmapi pudgalānāṃ praṇidhānendriyasatataghananirantarabhāvanāprayogapaṭutvābhyāsādiviśeṣāttulye'pi mārge patitānāṃ kaścitphalaviśeṣo bhavati|
759:1455: tatra bhagavato buddhasya karuṇābhāvanā codrekena vartate bhagavānbuddhaḥ|
759:1458: kiñca, parato ghoṣamantareṇāpi carame janmani suyoniṣo(śo)
759:1461: atha tulyāyāṃ vimuktau sthitānāṃ trayāṇāmabhisametṛṇāṃ ko viśeṣaḥ ? taducyate-
759:1495: evantu varṇayanti-sannikṛṣṭaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sthāpayitvā yatsarvasattvānāṃ bhogaiśvaryādhipatyaphalamiyadekasya puṇyasya pramāṇam||
759:1497: tatra kaḥ samāsaḥ kiṃ sādhano vā dānaśabdaḥ,
759:1503: ko vā dānasya svabhāvaḥ’ iti tatrāpadiśyate-
759:1509: astu tarhi karmasādhano dīyate taditi dānam|
759:1534: tatra svahitāyaiva yathā pṛthagjanaḥ parinirvate bhagavati caityāya dadāti parārthameva yathā arhan saṃghāya dadāti,
759:1541: tatra kathaṃ dātṛviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ vastuviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ kṣetraviśeṣaḥ ?
759:1545: śraddadhāno dadāti śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā buddhavacanabahuśrutaśca bhavati nirmatsarī muktahastaśca bhavati nirvāṇānuśaṃsaḥ satkṛtya svahastaṃ kālena parānanupahatya dadāti, sa khalu
759:1555: yadi vastu varṇagandharasasparśasampannaṃ bhavati tadā viśiṣyate|
759:1563: gatāya dānaṃ datvā śataguṇo vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣi[tavyaḥ syāt]|
759:1567: “glānāya dānaṃ glānopasthāya kāyadānaṃ śītalikāvardalikādiṣu ca dānam” iti vistaraḥ|
759:1570: ṣāṃ copakāriṇāṃ ye aṭavīdurgakāntāre bhūtavyasanebhyo nistārayanti|
759:1572: atha kathaṃ cetanāyāḥ viśeṣo bhavati ? brūmaḥ-
759:1577: tatrāśayābhiprāyaḥ yathā-evaṃ caivaṃ ca kuryāṃ kariṣyāmīti vā cetanāyā karmapathaṃ samākṣipati|
759:1587: atha kasya kasmai datvā dānamagryaphalaṃ bhavati ?
759:1592: yatkhalu bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvahitādhyāśayeṇa dānaṃ dadāti tadagryamuttamārthaphalatvāt bhagavatā'ṣṭau khalu dānānyuktāni sūtre “āsādya dānam|
759:1601: sūtra uktam-“sāṃcetanikasyāhaṃ karmaṇaḥ kṛtopacitasya nāpratisaṃvedyaphala vadāmi” iti|
759:1613: tadyathā maitrīvihāriṇo maharṣayo na ca lokaṃ sukhena yojayantyatha cāparimitaṃ puṇyaṃ pratigṛhṇantyevaṃ caityādiṣu tadguṇādhimuktivaśeṇa(na)
759:1633: etadapi śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu mahābhogatāphalaṃ mokṣaphalaṃ ca,
759:1640: yatkhalu śīlaṃ dauḥśīlyena na vidūṣitaṃ prāṇātipātādinā'ṣṭaprakāreṇa,
759:1656: yathā tailaṃ puṣpaiścampakādibhirvāsitaṃ tanmayi bhavati tatsamādhisaṃprayuktaistatsahabhūkaiśca dharmaiścittaṃ bhāvitaṃ vāsitamityucyate,
759:1663: kiṃ puṇyaṃ kriyā ca vastu ca puṇyakriyāvastu,
759:1673: yā tatsamutthāpikā cetanā sā puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca,
759:1676: bhāvanāmayaṃ maitro puṇyaṃ ca puṇyakriyāśca vastu|
759:1677: tatsaṃprayuktāyāścetanāyā maitryadhiṣṭhānenābhisaṃskārāṇāṃ maitrīsahabhūcetanā śīlaṃ ca puṇyakriyā ca|
759:1681: uttamārthaprāptaye khalvāsannatamo heturbhāvaneti kṛtvā bhagavatā bhāvanāmayameva kuśalamūlaṃ visaṃyogāya vidhiyuktamuktam|
759:1687: puṇyabhāgīyaṃ yena devamanuṣyopapattibījaṃ pratigṛhṇāti maheśākhyaiśca kulamahābhogarūpyacakravartiśakrapuṣpaketubrahmatvādīnāṃ prāptaye phalamākṣipati|
759:1692: atha yadidaṃ loka ucyate lipimudrāgaṇanāsaṃkhyeti eṣāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ ? ucyate-
759:1695: tatra tāvallipimudre yogapravartitaṃ kāyakarmasamutthānamiti pañcaskandhātmikā lipiḥ|
759:1696: yeṇa(na) tu karmaṇā'kṣarāṇi nirvartyante tatkarma lipirityucyate|
759:1702: yanmanasā saṃkalitaṃ dharmāṇāṃ sā tu saparivārā catuskandhasvabhāveti||
